thread.title: Noah Augustine

author: Noah Augustine
title: Noah Augustine
text: Hands down, Chewy has the best customer service I've ever encountered - from the little things to the big things. When I first signed up for auto ship my cat was feeling sick because I hadn't been able to get her prescription food and they expedited her order and had it to me within 24 hours. Then, when a delivery that FedEx said was delivered never showed up they shipped a replacement to me! They even sent a handwritten Christmas card to us, how can you even compete? Chewy is the best!
